definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
to be a stickler for formalities/to rigidly adhere to/to cling to/constrained/ill at ease

sentences.english: An experimental study on the gouge along Xiaojiang fault has been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對小江斷裂帶的斷層泥進行了實驗研究。

sentences.english: Clay bars should only be used by professionals.
sentences.chinese: 研磨泥只適用於專業類產品嗎？

sentences.english: Into a ball in the mud.
He hath cast me into the mire, and I am become like dust and ashes.
sentences.chinese: 神把我扔在泥中，我就像塵土和爐灰一般。

sentences.english: Befriender:Most ghosts turned into good guys with Pink Slime.
sentences.chinese: 大多數鬼變成好人與粉紅泥。

sentences.english: She fed the baby on pureed carrots .
sentences.chinese: 她用胡蘿蔔泥餵養那嬰兒。

sentences.english: The paddles above the wheel are covered with fungus and slime.
sentences.chinese: 以上輪槳板滿了真菌和泥。

sentences.english: Bake them whole or mash them with a bit of milk.
sentences.chinese: 整個拿去烤或是伴着點牛奶搗成泥都可以。

sentences.english: Back to the moody scores, I then wrote "Fogger, Snake, and Mud."
sentences.chinese: 回到穆迪分數，然後我寫了“煙霧機，蛇，和泥。”

sentences.english: Principle and practice for application of extractive technology in extracting gold from copper anode slime are described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹萃取技術在銅陰極泥提金中的應用原理和實踐。

sentences.english: The earth house 002 is a house with lightweight structure plus Straw-Clay wall.
sentences.chinese: 地球屋002號爲輕鋼屋架加草泥填充牆。

sentences.english: The softening effect of pink clay refines the skin's texture while toning the epidermis.
sentences.chinese: 粉紅泥的柔軟作用在強健表皮的同時使肌膚細膩。

sentences.english: Objective Present paper aims at Summing up the experience of mass hot cement burn Casulties.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結成批熱水泥燒傷病人救治經驗。

sentences.english: We are the clay, you are the potter;
Stir in milk and mashed bananas.
sentences.chinese: 接着加入牛奶和香蕉泥。

sentences.english: Remember, I beseech thee, that thou hast made me as the clay; and wilt thou bring me into dust again?
sentences.chinese: 求你記念製造我如摶泥一般，你還要使我歸於塵土嗎？

definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
